text: Ms. Shania Twain slayed. LOVE HER. 🤠💛

I enjoyed this documentary and back story of Shania Twain and how she rose to fame along with all her achievements. I have to say that I gained more respect for her and the effort that she put in to succeed along with all the hardships along the road that may have knocked others out.
Great job on this documentary. A great all time superstar from Ontario
A good look with never before seen images and audio. I did her book years ago and this doesn't compare. The book was great! It was more in depth! This is still worth the watch.

Wow talk about someone who is totally impressed with themselves. What happened to the siblings she was helping in the beginning? Did she help them after becoming famous? She had a child. Does she pay any attention to her child? We see her on a boat with her dog but never hear another word about her child. Doesn’t paint her in a very good picture in my opinion.
Only giving it 4.5 because I wish it was longer. You don't have to be a fan to enjoy this one. Her resilience and drive would inspire even the biggest cynic.
Meh - it was fine.  As a fan, there was no 'new news'....
